name: ShoppingCart
comment: The shopping cart entity is used for the temporary selection and reservation of product offerings during the order capture flow as well as during the update of products owned by customers. The shopping cart includes one or more cart items that correspond to both tangible and intangible goods and services, such as a mobile device, family plan, and Internet plan.
vf short description: The shopping cart entity is used for the temporary selection and reservation of product offerings during the order capture flow as well as during the update of products owned by customers.

fields.name: ShoppingCartSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ShoppingCartKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of each Shopping Cart in aLDM. Generated Key based on Shopping Cart Id

fields.name: ShoppingCartId
fields.comment: Indicates the source Id of the shopping cart. ShoppingCart.id

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Indicates the validity start date of the shopping cart. ShoppingCart.validFor.startDateTime

fields.name: EndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the validity end date of the shopping cart. ShoppingCart.validFor.endDateTime

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ContactSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ShoppingCartStateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InitialSalesChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: The date on which the shopping cart was created. ShoppingCart.creationDate

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: The date on which the shopping cart was modified. ShoppingCart.lastUpdate

fields.name: EmailAddressInd
fields.comment: Indiactes the email address provided during shopping cart creation. ShoppingCart.contactMedium.characteristic.emailAddress where ShoppingCart.contactMedium.type = "email Address" and ShoppingCart.contactMedium.preferred = "true"

fields.name: PhoneNumber
fields.comment: Indiactes the phone number provided during shopping cart creation. ShoppingCart.contactMedium.characteristic.phoneNumber where ShoppingCart.contactMedium.type = "Telephone number" and ShoppingCart.contactMedium.preferred = "true"

fields.name: PostalAddressInd
fields.comment: Indiactes the postal address provided during shopping cart creation. ShoppingCart.contactMedium.characteristic.street1 || ShoppingCart.contactMedium.characteristic.street2 || ShoppingCart.contactMedium.characteristic.city || ShoppingCart.contactMedium.characteristic.stateOrProvince || ShoppingCart.contactMedium.characteristic.country || ShoppingCart.contactMedium.characteristic.postCode where ShoppingCart.contactMedium.type = "postalAddress" and ShoppingCart.contactMedium.preferred = "true"

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
